Name: Pool Slide Story
About the game: Splish, splash, splosh! The time has come to create some waves and open your very own wet, wonderful (sometimes whacky) water park! Hear that? That’s the sound of super-slippy pool-slide shenanigans. You want in? Of course you do. Expand your water park, adding exciting facilities, and become the talk of the town. Your visitors will take selfies at your park, generating free publicity for you! Befriend them and they'll send you comments and suggestions. Make your visitors happy by offering a range of foods and beverages for purchase at food stalls, creating colored or scented pools, and giving away free floats and swimwear. Collect ingredients and cook foods, then create menus for your food stalls. You'll be spoiled for choice when customizing your water park, with a wide choice of attractions to build. You can also have both indoor and outdoor pools, so that no matter the weather, your visitors will always have somewhere to splash about in comfort. Can you create a wonderful water park that everyone will love? ▼ Game Flow Build pools, restaurants and various attractions, working your way up to becoming a 5-star water park. Fulfilling visitors' wishes is key to keep developing your park. ▼ Visitors You get satisfaction points when visitors are happy with your pools, restaurants and attractions. Fill up the satisfaction gauge and visitors will post about your park online. ▼ Social Media Your visitors may post about your water park on social media. When that happens, you will get likes based on the popularity of your park and the number of people visiting. You can also 'like' posts submitted by other users. Likes do not only affect your park's popularity, but also the ease with which you get new visitors and your park's evaluation when applying for certificates. ▼ Visitors' Wishes Satisfied customers will want to share their feedback with you. Fulfill their wishes and they will fall in love with your park even more! -- Try searching for 'Kairosoft' to see all of our games!! Feel free to follow me♪
